description: This file defines the NotificationsService class responsible for fetching user notifications via an HTTP API using Dio client. It includes a method to retrieve and parse notifications into NotificationItem instances.

classes.name: NotificationsService
classes.description: A service class that fetches notifications for the current user from the backend API.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetches a list of notifications for the current user, handles different response data formats, and returns a list of NotificationItem objects.
